Title: Beavis and Butt-Head Do America
Overview: Slacker duo Beavis and Butt-Head wake to discover their TV has been stolen. Their search for a new one takes them on a clueless adventure across America, during which they manage to accidentally become America's most wanted.
Tagline: Coming to a screen bigger than your TV.
